price: Garuu isaannan obsaniifi toltuuwwan dalagan malee, warri sun araaramaafi mindaa guddaatu isaaniif jira.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ṣabarū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
